after: The Kingdom of Thailand (Thai: à¸£à¸²à¸à¸­à¸²à¸à¸²à¸à¸±à¸à¸£à¹à¸à¸¢) is a country in Southeast Asia. The country traces its origin to the Sukhothai Kingdom founded in 1238 and its successive Ayutthaya Kingdom.

The heart-land of the country is the Chao Phraya plain around its capital Bangkok. It has a coast to both the Gulf of Thailand as well as the Andaman Sea, bordering the countries Malaysia to the south, Burma to the west and Laos and Cambodia to the east.
